posts.post_title: FT: Hindu Shag Shaughnessy- Great condition
posts.post_content:
Posted By: david Poses
I have a Hindu Shag Shaughnessy for trade only- was graded GAI3 (I think undergraded). I have since cracked it out, so it is now raw. 

I want to trade down to a Piedmont or Old Mill Shag. 

Will only consider trades that include similar condition Shags with either of those backs. 

Ideally, I'd like to swap my card for yours and a few other SLers, but I'm open to non-SLers also. 

You can see the card in its old GAI holder here:

[URL="http://s268.photobucket.com/albums/jj16/sesop/?action=view&current=hindushaggai3.jpg"][IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj16/sesop/hindushaggai3.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Please email me with any trade ideas: davidp@krasdalefoods.com

Thanks
